name: com.ektishaf.api
description:
This is an official package of Blockchain API that brings gaming and blockchain together, whether it be NFTs or other tokens. 

Main features: 

▪ Simplify blockchain onboarding with built-in wallet creation functionality. Users can securely generate and manage their wallets directly within your game
▪ Ensure smooth, intuitive, and hassle-free seamless cryptocurrency transactions
▪ Easily mint, display, and interact with NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens). Whether for collectibles, in-game assets, or rewards, the toolkit includes everything to bring NFTs into your project
▪ Build your custom marketplace for users to buy, sell, and trade NFTs or other digital assets

Note: Please keep track of the latest updates on our official website
https://www.ektishaf.com

samples.description: Contains a demo to demonstrate wallet connect, blockchain communication and marketplace
